name: ssshelter
description:
This is our game for the 152th weekly game jam. It features two snakes looking for shelter - the game jams theme. This little puzzle game allows you to partner up with a friend and solve a couple of small stages. You have to occupy all grey block with the two snakes in order to solve each level.

Player 1 uses wasd.
Player 2 uses arrow keys.

This game was done with Unity, Houdini and Affinity Photo by olst and MalarkeyVD in 6 days.
